title: Platform Maintenance Scheduled
description: Scheduled maintenance window for platform updates and performance improvements.

content.data:
We will be performing scheduled maintenance on our platform to implement important updates and performance improvements.

Maintenance Details:

• Date: January 15, 2024
• Time: 2:00 AM - 6:00 AM EST
• Duration: Approximately 4 hours
• Impact: Platform will be temporarily unavailable

During this time, you will not be able to access:
• Course content
• Progress tracking
• User dashboard
• Mobile app

We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience.

What to expect after maintenance:

✅ Improved page load times
✅ Enhanced video streaming quality
✅ Better mobile app performance
✅ New features and bug fixes

We will send a notification once maintenance is complete.
